thread.title: Police called after 'drunk' Aurigny passenger makes 'advance to female crew member'
thread.title_full: Police called after 'drunk' Aurigny passenger makes 'advance to female crew member' | Channel - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Police called after 'drunk' Aurigny passenger makes 'advance to female crew member'
text:
Aurigny have claimed two passengers on board a flight yesterday evening had been 'secretly drinking duty free' on board and were drunk.
They also says one of the passengers allegedly 'made an advance to a female crew member.'
Police were called to attend the incident, no arrests were made.
It happened on a flight from Guernsey to Gatwick.
We expect our crews to be treated with respect. If an issue occurs, we have the right to inform local police to investigate any incidents we report to them.
â€“ Aurigny Airline Last updated Fri 2 Oct 2015 Travel Guernsey Jersey
